name: easy-busboy
description: Await-like simple Busboy wrapper for express 4, 5, Koa, also works within some cloud functions

scripts.examples:servers:install: cd examples/servers/express4 && pnpm i && cd ../express5 && pnpm i && cd ../koa && pnpm i
scripts.examples:servers:clean: (cd examples/servers/express4 && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm pnpm-lock.yaml) & (cd ../express5 && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm pnpm-lock.yaml) & (cd ../koa && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm pnpm-lock.yaml)
